architectural_notes: Backend security layer (AccessControl traps) being removed from all functions
toggleAgentStatus modified to update agent status without authentication
clearBoardroom function added to reset transcript state

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all AccessControl traps from backend
Fix toggleAgentStatus to work without traps
Add clearBoardroom function to clear transcript

Remove all AccessControl trap blocks from backend/main.mo. Delete every single if (not (AccessControl...)) { Runtime.trap(...) }; statement from the entire file, including those in getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile, toggleAgentStatus, abortDebate, start_boardroom_debate, routeDocument, getFileRegistry, topUpSwarm, and initializeAgents functions.

Fix toggleAgentStatus function in backend/main.mo to match the exact implementation provided: public shared ({ caller }) func toggleAgentStatus(agentName : Text, status : Bool) : async () { let agentOpt = getAgentByName(agentName); switch (agentOpt) { case (null) {}; case (?agent) { let updatedAgent = { agent with isEnabled = status }; agents.remove(agent.id); agents.add(agent.id, updatedAgent); }; }; };

Add clearBoardroom function to the bottom of the actor in backend/main.mo with exact implementation: public shared ({ caller }) func clearBoardroom() : async () { currentState := { currentState with transcript = "" }; };
